title: Weapons of Isengard (4R211)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an [Isengard] archer to place an [Isengard] token on this card. Archery: Remove 2 [Isengard] tokens from this card to make the minion archery total +2. Discard this condition.
Lore:	Crossbowmen arrived with munitions from Isengard.
Rarity:	R
